inputList.title: Custom文件名
inputList.name: file_name
inputList.tip: 不需要Input扩展名，System会自动添加扩展名【System建议打开显示扩展名】

inputList.title: Simulate Manual Click
inputList.name: simulate_flag
inputList.tip: Simulated manual click mimics human operation, otherwise uses automation interface

inputList.title: 最长等待时间
inputList.name: time_out
inputList.tip: 超过最长等待时间（秒）则停止等待

BrowserSoftware.upload_web_file.title: File Upload (Web)
BrowserSoftware.upload_web_file.comment: 在网页中点击 @{element_data} ，在弹出的文件选择Dialog中Input要上传的文件路径 @{upload_path}

inputList.title: Browser Object
inputList.name: browser_obj
inputList.tip: 选择要点击上传的网页元素所在的Browser Object

inputList.title: 拾取点击目标
inputList.name: element_data
inputList.tip: 选择要点击上传的网页元素

inputList.title: 上传文件路径
inputList.name: upload_path
inputList.tip: 待上传文件完整路径，若要选择多个文件，切换到Python模式，Input文件列表，例:["文件1路径", "文件2路径"]

inputList.title: Simulate Manual Click
inputList.name: simulate_flag
inputList.tip: Simulated manual click mimics human operation, otherwise uses automation interface
